io.fluo.mapreduce

Class FluoOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<Loader,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
      • io.fluo.mapreduce.FluoOutputFormat

  • public class FluoOutputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<Loader,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
    This output format enables the execution of load transaction against a Fluo table using map reduce.
